description:
Suruga Kanbaru, an underclassman, came to visit Tsubasa Hanekawa now that she has resumed attending school. Apparently, Koyomi Araragi has asked for Suruga`s presence tonight. Tsubasa returned to Hitagi`s house without knowing what was going on, only to meet up with unexpected individuals.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 猫物語(白) つばさタイガー 其ノ參
